title: Which of the following resulted from the policies

content.question: Which of the following resulted from the policies of the Andrew Jackson administration?

choices.label: The value of paper currency issued by individual banks became uniform.
The number of banks, each issuing its own paper currency, increased.
A nationwide banking system was begun.
Federal fiscal activities became linked to a system of federal banks.

content.answer: The number of banks, each issuing its own paper currency, increased.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
